description: This file defines a 'Quiz' page component for a lightning-based application, displaying questions with options, handling user interactions, and navigating to results.

classes.name: Component
classes.description: Base component class from '@lightningjs/blits' that this component extends.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the current quiz question and resets option backgrounds.

methods.name: select
methods.description: Selects an answer option, updating the UI to highlight the selected option.

methods.name: next
methods.description: Advances to the next question or navigates to the results page if quiz is complete, updating the score accordingly.
